= Folding =
== By syntax ==
You nedd `set foldmethod=syntax`
* `z-o`: opens a fold at the cursor
* `z-S+o`: opens all folds at the cursor
* `z-c`: closes a fold at the cursor
* `z-m`: increases the _foldevel_ by one
* `z-S+m`: closes all open folds
* `z-r`: decreases the _foldlevel_ by one
* `z-S+r`: decreases the _foldlevel_ to zero -- all folds will be open
